H0.text: The Syrah grape variety makes wine that is. Purple

H1.text: The Syrah grape variety makes wine that is. Amber

H2.text: The Syrah grape variety makes wine that is. Pink

H3.text: The Syrah grape variety makes wine that is. Red

A4.text: Syrah is a dark-skinned grape variety grown throughout the world and used primarily to produce red wine.
